item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid support To enable mermaid, the mermaid for extention should be set. Example --- mdext: - mermaid --- There are two way to use mermaid Use short code Use markdown customized block Use shortcode mermaid.initialize({startOnLoad:true}); graph LR; A[Hard edge] --|Link text| B(Round edge) B -- C{Decision} C --|One| D[Result one] C --|Two| E[Result two] Shortcode {{<mermaid>}} graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] {{< /mermaid >}} Markdown customized block(WIP) graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] ```mermaid graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two]

item.title: KaTeX
item.description: KaTeX support KaTeX let you to render math typesetting in markdown document. See KaTeX To enable KaTeX, the katex for extention should be set. Example --- mdext: - katex --- There are two way to use KaTeX Use short code Use markdown customized block Use shortcode \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\) Shortcode {{< katex>}} f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi {{< /katex >}} Markdown customized block(WIP) f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi ```katex f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi
